Author: medsi2
Title: MIV ICO refund in progress
Body: You can move MIV to new PC by copying and paste the wallet.dat file from the old PC. You can find the wallet.dat file on  C > users > Your pc name > AppData (hidden folder) > Roaming > makeitviral   Quote from: Clark05 on October 01, 2017, 02:27:56 AM It is ICO ends.? How the ICo it is collected enough funds ? I like to invest but I dont if IcO is still continue. If Ico ends where can I buy tokens ? Thanks to the people who gibe the direct link so I can buy tokens now I invest some only. I will choose ICO now and I see the potential of this project.  ICO is live and it will end on 15th of November. You can participate in the ICO on our website http://miv.life/ and following our guide https://medium.com/@MIVlife/how-to-participate-in-the-miv-crowdfunding-40ccc525252e After the ICO, if it's successful, MIV will be available for trading on at least one exchanger. Otherwise we will refund BTC collected to investors.  Quote from: sxafir on October 01, 2017, 05:06:16 AM What happend with unsold coin?  As stated on our terms, if ICO succeed, unsold MIV will be taken from the team and used for the platform/promotion or for having a 2nd ICO if needed. You can find our full terms here http://miv.life/miv_terms.pdf

Author: medsi2
Title: MIV ICO refund in progress
Body: Hi,  The minimum to be collected is 20 BTC, with that amount we will do:  1. Be listed on Exchangers after the ICO 2. Having a Marketing Campaign much better that the one we are having 3. Improve our Website for a more professional layout 4.Change Logo and Brand 5. Develop an essential Alpha Version of Make It Viral   Actually our ICO will end on 15th November and we hope to reach that amount by that date.  We know that 50 Billions MIV are a lot, but they have been calculated for the whole ecosystem. On Medium we wrote articles about our vision about MIV and an analysis of the Market ( https://medium.com/@MIVlife/miv-ecosystem-analysis-a0b16c8ad64b ) ( https://medium.com/@MIVlife/make-it-viral-our-vision-709e02cfa2d4 )  In case we won't reach 20 BTC we will refund investors as stated on our terms (Available on the website)

Author: MIV.matteo
Title: MIV ICO refund in progress
Body: UPDATE  We are happy to announce the dates and rates of crowdfunding. Crowdfunding will start on 8th of August 16:00 GMT at https://www.miv.life/ and it will end on 15th of November.  Rates will be the following: - 3 satoshis during August - 4 satoshi during September - 5 satoshi during October and till 15th of November.  We also decided to reduce the minimum amount that can be raised to 40 BTC. According to these details the max cap will be 1500 BTC (30 Bn x 5 sat).  UPDATE REGARDING MIV BOUNTY AND EXTRA REWARDS: As we promised, we want to rewards those users that joined earlier our campaign bounty and were interested by the postponement of MIV crowdfunding. Since we postponed the crowdfunding of 3 weeks ( 18th July -> 8th August), we are gonna send MIV to those users that were active during 1st & 2nd & 3rd week. We will distribute 100M MIV to those users, within 48 hours. You are invited to check your details (such as MIV address) on our bounty topic https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1976135.0 In this way, participants of the crowdfunding will have access to an active blockchain, where users will be able to start staking.  Kind Regards, MIV team

Title: MIV ICO refund in progress
Body: If you want to help MIV you could join the Signature Campaign  We have done some calculations and during last week (5th week) rates were:  Code: Jr Member = 150-250$  Full Member/Sr Member no avatar = 225$ - 375$  Full Member/Sr Member yes avatar = 300$ - 500$  Hero/Legendary no avatar = 300$ - 500$  Hero/Legendary yes avatar = 375$ - 625$  Calculations done assuming the Crowdfunding rate of 3-5 satoshi each MIV.  Good opportunity to help MIV and get nice rewards at the same time

Author: medsi2
Title: MIV ICO refund in progress
Body: We are updating the Website and we will announce the new date as soon as we know. Thank you for your support  Quote from: BTCdoaA on July 17, 2017, 07:01:17 AM would you explain to us the different between this project and spectiv which found here : https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1975254 Thanks  I took a look at the project and their whitepaper: It seems that Spectiv aim to Virtual Reality market. They are different in few aspects: for example MIV is based principally on the combination of the Micro-donations system + Ranking system (just for this the concept are very different). Then there is also difference on the ADS, since we aim to eliminate ads (or reduce dramatically them).

Author: medsi2
Title: MIV ICO refund in progress
Body: At the moment we don't have any ETA. We decided to play safe, we don't like the idea of starting a crowdfunding, pausing it for days and resuming it. You need also to take in consideration that there is a risk of loss and we think that most people would like to keep control of their funds during those risky days.   Quote from: adsamy on July 18, 2017, 06:33:45 AM most of them will be given free to active users through the platform？How do I participate in your free currency Ling?   15 billions MIV will be allocated for free giveaway (bounty included).  The Free MIV will be distributed when Make It Viral will be released, so according to our Roadmap Q3-2018. You will need just to sign-up and use our mobile App or website   Bounty will be released once MIV crowdfunding end.

Author: medsi2
Title: MIV ICO refund in progress
Body: UPDATE   Guys, we are sorry to announce that due to the upcoming events occurring during the 1st of August,  we must postpone the Crowdfunding. We thought about this decision during the past days, and we came to the conclusion that It would be better for us and for You to postpone it. We wrote an article about it on Medium:  https://medium.com/@MIVlife/miv-crowdfunding-posticipated-f4044b9e3422  Crowdfunding rates, dates, and phases will be  given after everything is calmed down.  BOUNTY: we would like to inform those who joined the bounty, that we will increase MIV allocated to bounty depending on the extension of the campaign duration.  I'm personally, as Founder & CEO, sorry about this event. I don't like this decision, but it's the RIGHT thing to do at the moment, since no one really know what's going to happen and it would be risky for you and me to operate during 1st August. I want also to let know that the project it's still valid and I will not let a technical issue (not even caused by me) to ruin everything. I'm still excited about MIV and want to create a great platform. This is an obstacle during the path, we just have to overcome it and work hard for Make It Viral.

Body: Thank you.  The concept of Make It Viral is completely different from Library. In works on donations and microdonations and users choose to send MIV to what they like; In fact uploaders don't set a price.
